attributes.action: Oxfordshire Peace Supporters - First Petition - Israel / Palestine
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned residents of Oxfordshire, support the rights of Israelis and Palestinians to live securely and in peace side by side in two states, Israel and Palestine, based on mutual respect and negotiated international peace agreements between their elected Governments.

We call upon the UK Government to continue to actively encourage peace talks with the above aim by making representations to the two Governments, and to also continue to support this aim via other international fora including the Quartet, the EU and the United Nations.
